org.tango.settingsmanager.client

Class SettingsManagerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tango.settingsmanager.client.SettingsManagerClient

  • public class SettingsManagerClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is able to give a client class for a majority of SettingsManager calls
    Author:
    verdier
